short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily scroll to top of the page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Have you ever faced a problem where you scroll to the very end of webpage and then before make any further action you have to scroll to the top of the page. 
Does it sound like waste of time? Not now since using this menu you can just do this with a click of button. 

Install Extensions -> Right click -> ScrollTo the top of the page
